rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Small space with ample natural light, serves as a transitional space between outside and inside. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the main entrance to the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area that doubles as a reception room with large windows for natural light and ventilation, designed in Chettinad style with detailed woodwork and stone accents.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the open-plan kitchen and living area. The space is designed to be flexible for gatherings and dining, ensuring natural light through skylights and large windows.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Chettinad kitchen with integrated cooking island, open layout connecting to living area. Features ample ventilation via high ceilings and exhaust systems following local building norms.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated office space optimized for work-from-home setups. Placed on the west side to ensure minimal distractions and optimal natural light, in line with Vastu recommendations for creativity and productivity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring large windows for natural light and cross ventilation. Decorated with traditional Chettinad elements like carved wood detailing.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room designed to maintain the aesthetic of a bachelor pad while ensuring privacy and natural lighting through strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Study/Bachelor Space
rooms.description: Multi-purpose area that doubles as a study or recreational space. Designed with modern furnishings and ample light, following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-lit and ventilated bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, ensuring privacy and adherence to local building codes.
